definition: change in outward structure or looks
details:
verb
- change in outward structure or looks
= example: change in outward structure or looks
= synonyms: transmute, metamorphose
- increase or decrease (an alternating current or voltage)
- change (a bacterial cell) into a genetically distinct cell by the introduction of DNA from another cell of the same or closely related species
- convert (one form of energy) to another
= example: convert (one form of energy) to another
- change or alter in form, appearance, or nature
= example: change or alter in form, appearance, or nature
= synonyms: transmute, transubstantiate
- change from one form or medium into another
= synonyms: translate
- subject to a mathematical transformation
